testcase.name: Test Case 116
testcase.system-out: Given User is on automation page............................................passed Then User verifies that home page is visible successfully...................passed Then User clicks on 'Signup / Login' button.................................passed Then User verifies 'New User Signup!' is visible............................passed Then User enters name and email address to sign up..........................passed Then User clicks Signup button to sign up for user..........................passed Then User verifies that 'ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION' is visible..............passed Then User fills details: Title, Name, Email, Password, Date of birth........passed Then User selects checkbox1 'Sign up for our newsletter!'...................passed Then User selects checkbox2 'Receive special offers from our partners!'.....passed Then User fills details: First name, Last name, Company, Address, Address2, Country, State, City, Zipcode, Mobile Number.passed Then User clicks 'Create Account button'....................................passed
